snippet.title: Asteroid Invaders - Level One Play Through
snippet.description:
In this video we take you through level one of Asteroid Invaders, the easiest level in the game and provide you with a quick tutorial. 

If you like classic Space Shooter Games like Asteroids and Space Invaders among others then you will love this cool fun to play game. Beautiful graphics combined with original music and action packed game- play make this a must have for any casual gamer.

Download for free here:

IOS:

https://apps.apple.com/us/app/asteroid-invaders/id1458704786?ls=1

Android:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Cirocco.AsteroidInvaders

Also visit our website and Asteroid Invaders community at:

http://asteroidinvaders.com

Instructions for game controls:

Complete game control instructions for the PC and mobile versions of Asteroid Invaders are included in the game. Select the "Info" icon in on the main screen of the game and the select "Play Instructions".
